text:
The Smarter Web Company RNS Announcement: Bitcoin Purchase.

The Smarter Web Company (AQUIS:
#SWC
| OTCQB:
$TSWCF
| FRA: $3M8), a London-listed technology company and the UK’s largest publicly traded company holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet, announces the purchase of additional Bitcoin as part of “The 10 Year Plan” which includes an ongoing treasury policy of acquiring Bitcoin. 

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company RNS Announcement: Subscription Agreement Update - £0.3m Proceeds.

The Smarter Web Company (AQUIS: SWC | OTCQB: TSWCF | FRA: 3M8), a London-listed technology company and the UK’s largest publicly traded company holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet, announces that 407,500 Ordinary Shares have been placed in accordance with the terms of the Subscription Agreement announced on 04 September 2025 (the “Subscription Shares”).

The gross proceeds from the placing of the Subscription Shares will be £276,781.80 (before expenses), equivalent to approximately £0.68 per share, and the Company will receive approximately 98% of the proceeds as settlement early this week. The balance of Ordinary Shares not yet placed pursuant to the Subscription Agreement is 13,470,500.

Please read the RNS on our website:
investors.smarterwebcompany.…

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
RNS Announcement: Subscription Agreement Update - £0.1m Proceeds

The Smarter Web Company, a London-listed technology company and the UK’s largest publicly traded company holding Bitcoin on its balance sheet, announces that 230,000 Ordinary Shares have been placed in accordance with the terms of the Subscription Agreement announced on 04 September 2025 (the “Subscription Shares”).

The gross proceeds from the placing of the Subscription Shares will be £140,548.74 (before expenses), equivalent to approximately £0.61 per share, and the Company will receive approximately 98% of the proceeds as settlement early this week. The balance of Ordinary Shares not yet placed pursuant to the Subscription Agreement is 13,240,500.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

AQUIS:
#SWC
| OTCQB:
$TSWCF
| FRA: $3M8

text:
Important message to our shareholders: please take a moment to vote in the upcoming General Meeting - your support truly matters.

Most shareholders hold their stock through a nominee service (e.g. Hargreaves Lansdown or AJ Bell).

Voting is simple: just log in to your broker’s platform or contact them directly. Most now offer quick online voting and it only takes a few minutes.

If you are coming to the meeting in person and hold your shares through a nominee service do not forget to obtain the necessary paperwork and authority to attend. Alternatively if you hold your shares directly, you will receive documentation by post, which you can bring with you as evidence of your shareholding.

Thank you for your continued support. It makes a real difference.

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time

text:
The Smarter Web Company RNS Announcement: General Meeting.

The Smarter Web Company (AQUIS:
#SWC
| OTCQB:
$TSWCF
| FRA: $3M8) announces that it will today be posting a notice convening a general meeting of the Company to be held at John James Theatre, Aerospace Bristol, Hayes Way, Patchway, Bristol, BS34 5BZ on 02 December 2025 at 11.00 a.m.

The general meeting will take place at Aerospace Bristol, home to Concorde Alpha Foxtrot - the last of the iconic supersonic jets to be built and flown.

Shareholders attending the event will have the unique opportunity to step aboard Concorde, explore the cockpit, and walk through the passenger cabin to experience first hand how travellers once flew in unparalleled style and speed. Access to Concorde will be available from 10.00 a.m.

To help us plan, please comment below if you will be attending so we can gauge numbers.

Please read the RNS on our website (link in comments).

engagement.note: These figures were correct as of January 27, 2026, 12:00 PM London time
